entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
